explains: adj. 效率低的，能力差的，浪费的

sentences.en: The whole system is inefficient and corrupt.
sentences.cn: 整个体系都效率低下并且腐败堕落。

sentences.en: The whole process is wasteful and inefficient.
sentences.cn: 整个程序既浪费又效率低。

sentences.en: The welfare system is grossly inequitable and inefficient.
sentences.cn: 福利制度非常不公平，效率也极低。
